description: recto:  old man with long beard and moustache, wearing a hooded cloak, with his PL arm and part of his body hidden by a wall; verso:  study of a nude winged figure with arms up toward right, looking toward left; study of a hand holding a curved baton (?) in ULC
marks:
Signature and Inscription

LLC, in pencil: [Etud LRQ recto, in pencil: [Jules Machard.]
medium: Red chalk on tan wove paper
provenance: [David & Constance Yates Fine Drawings, New York, until 1985; sold in October for AOO, to Drake]; Harry Drake, St. Paul (1985-d. 2012; bequeathed to MIA)
title: Study for Notre Dame de la Croix, Paris (recto); Nude Angel (verso)
